content:
Good afternoon,
Im trying to use the method getCode() on Observation object but Im getting the error below.Do you know what library/package needs to be included ?
TError: he method getCode() is undefined for the type Observation
What reference implementation (i.e. language) and what version of FHIR?
HAPI questions should ideally be asked on the #hapi thread. @James Agnew ?
